name: Krampusnacht
description:
Season's Beatings!

Krampusnacht is an 8-bit tile-based Christmas horror game.

⏰ Lasts 20 to 30 minutes!

It's the night of December 5th. Tomorrow is the Feast of St. Nicholas, when children are given all sorts of gifts... if they make it through the night.

If you've been naughty, you will meet your doom at the hands of Krampus, an ancient demon who punishes evildoers once every year.

Gameplay
  • Movement is tile-based
  • Interact with objects & people by walking into them
  • Unlock doors, gather & use items
  • Run from Krampus!
Controls

Keyboard
Arrow Keys - Move
A - Action
Enter - Pause

Gamepad
D-Pad / Left Thumbstick - Move
A - Action
Enter - Pause
